title: i cant play the new client on my computer
body: hopefully someone can help so I hit the play button and select my game type then after that nothing happens ..... I cant choose my position or anything ...............ive tried to reinstall it 3 times and tried to delete the league client thing like everyone else is doing still nothing ............. plzzzzzzz help!

replies.body: That's pretty frustrating, and a reinstall is definitely a solid step.  In addition, though, I suggest[ enabling low spec mode](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/JUMOM3jH-i-cant-play-the-new-client-on-my-computer).  This might resolve whatever is causing the crash during champion select by disabling the fancy aesthetics.  Test it in a custom to prevent any penalties, and let me know that helps!
well it wont make it to champ select .... I choose my game type then I cant find a match because it wont highlight the find match button???????????;/

Thanks for the info!  Have you re-logged yet in case client is missing an update?  You might be unable to queue up for a match until the patcher's grabbed necessary updates to get you on the same patch as everyone else.  If the issue continues, try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that your network can both get updates and keep you connected to the matchmaking service.  Let me know if you have any questions!
